A Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Sempre que você jogar uma carta, cause !M! de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

Adrenaline.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe [G]. NL Compre 2 cartas. NL Exaurir.
Adrenaline.NAME: Adrenalina

After Image.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inato. NL Sempre que você jogar uma carta, ganhe 1 de Proteção.

Aggregate.DESCRIPTION: Ganhe [B] para cada !M! cartas na sua pilha de compra.

ForeignInfluence.NAME: Foreign Influence
ForeignInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks to add to your hand. These cards can be of any color. NL Exhaust.
ForeignInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Upgraded Attacks to add to your hand. These cards can be of any color. Exhaust.

SignatureMove.NAME: Signature Move
SignatureMove.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this is your only Attack. Deal !D! damage.

SublimeSlice.NAME: DEPRECATED Sublime Slice
SublimeSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enter a random Stance.

ReachHeaven.NAME: Reach Heaven
ReachHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a NL *Through *Violence into your draw pile.
ReachHeaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an Upgraded *Through *Violence into your draw pile.

Insight.NAME: Insight
Insight.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.
Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.

BattleHymn.NAME: Battle Hymn
BattleHymn.DESCRIPTION: The first card you draw each turn has its cost reduced by !M! for the turn.
BattleHymn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! *Smites into your hand.

SoothingAura.NAME: DEPRECATED Soothing Aura
SoothingAura.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Weak to a random enemy. NL Retains.

BowlingBash.NAME: Bowling Bash
BowlingBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat.

Truth.NAME: Truth
Truth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.
Truth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.

Smite.NAME: Smite
Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.

Omniscience.NAME: Omniscience
Omniscience.DESCRIPTION: Scry your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Omega.NAME: Omega
Omega.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Serenity.NAME: Serenity
Serenity.DESCRIPTION: While you are in Calm, HP loss is reduced by !M!.

Judgement.NAME: Judgement
Judgement.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their NL HP to 0.

MentalFortress.NAME: Mental Fortress
MentalFortress.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you switch Stances, gain !M! Block.

EmptyBody.NAME: Empty Body
EmptyBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exit your Stance.

Crescendo.NAME: Crescendo
Crescendo.DESCRIPTION: Enter Wrath. NL Retains. NL Exhaust.

SandsOfTime.NAME: Sands of Time
SandsOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this card is Retained, lower its cost by 1. NL Retains.

Blasphemy.NAME: Blasphemy
Blasphemy.DESCRIPTION: Enter Divinity. NL Die next turn.
Blasphemy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Divinity. NL Die next turn. NL Exhaust.

Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
Transcendence.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards that Retain in your hand.

Flare.NAME: DEPRECATED Flare
Flare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Wrath: Gain [W] [W] .

Unraveling.NAME: Unraveling
Unraveling.DESCRIPTION: Play all of the cards in your hand from left to right. Targets are chosen randomly. NL Exhaust.

Weave.NAME: Weave
Weave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add this card to your hand when it would be discarded from your draw pile.

CrushJoints.NAME: Crush Joints
CrushJoints.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the previous card played was a Skill, apply !M! Vulnerable.

Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: If your HP is less than it was last turn, enter Wrath.

CarveReality.NAME: Carve Reality
CarveReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose NL *Smite or *Truth. NL Add the chosen card to your hand.
CarveReality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose Upgraded NL *Smite or *Truth. NL Add the chosen card to your hand.

CrescentKick.NAME: DEPRECATED Crescent Kick
CrescentKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Vigor, NL gain [W] and NL draw 1 card.

Swipe.NAME: DEPRECATED Swipe
Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal half this damage to all other enemies.

InnerPeace.NAME: Inner Peace
InnerPeace.DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm. NL End your turn.

StepAndStrike.NAME: Step and Strike
StepAndStrike.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less per switched Stance this turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

Prediction.NAME: DEPRECATED Prediction
Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block at the start of your next turn.

Flow.NAME: DEPRECATED Flow
Flow.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity. When you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Strength.

FlurryOfBlows.NAME: Flurry Of Blows
FlurryOfBlows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL On Stance change, returns from the Exhaust Pile to your Hand. Exhaust.

SashWhip.NAME: Sash Whip
SashWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the previous card played was an Attack, apply !M! Weak.

Indignation.NAME: Indignation
Indignation.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Wrath, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies, otherwise enter Wrath.

LiveForever.NAME: Live Forever
LiveForever.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Plated Armor.

ConjureBlade.NAME: Conjure Blade
ConjureBlade.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Expunger into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
ConjureBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Upgraded *Expunger into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

WaveOfTheHand2.NAME: Wave of the Hand A
WaveOfTheHand2.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain change Stances this turn, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Fasting2.NAME: Fasting B
Fasting2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain 1 less [W] at the start of each turn.

Discipline.NAME: Discipilne
Discipline.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with unused [W] , draw that many additional cards next turn.

Flick.NAME: Flick
Flick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an enemy is *Flicked 3 times, they take !M! damage.

LikeWater.NAME: LikeWater
LikeWater.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain !M! Block.

Study.NAME: Study
Study.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.
